entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 1:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: E 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
